text: Christine is a 1983 supernatural horror mystery thriller movie. This movie is set in 1978. It is about an automobile named Christine, a Plymouth Fury from 1958, who has a mind of its own and is a killer. This movie was released in North America on December 9, 1983. The movie got very good reviews from critics. == References == == Other websites == * * * Category:1983 horror movies Category:1983 thriller movies Category:1983 mystery movies Category:American horror movies Category:American mystery movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Supernatural horror movies Category:Mystery thriller movies Category:1980s English-language movies Category:Movies about automobiles Category:Movies set in the 1950s Category:Movies set in the 1970s Category:Movies set in California Category:Movies set in Detroit Category:Movies directed by John Carpenter Category:Movies based on books by Stephen King Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: Christine (1983 movie)
